item.title: Timothée Chalamet Aims to Promote Financial Literacy in Cash App Campaign
item.description: Timothée Chalamet’s next big-screen role might not be as complex as some of the one he has previously inhabited. The actor is taking part in an new campaign from Cash App, a mobile payment servi

item.title: Timothée Chalamet’s Pre-‘Superman’ Ad Debuts Online as Actor Reveals Intent of Cash App Collab
item.description: The Oscar nominee reeled in two prior creative collaborators to put his signature touches on the spot: “Financial literacy across all age groups is important and this spot seeks to emphasize that.”
